briefTitle: Using Technology to Improve Physical Activity Levels Among Postmenopausal Women (The Active & Aware Study)
officialTitle: Using Technology to Promote Activity in Women at Elevated Breast Cancer Risk
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female
* Postmenopausal
* BMI \>= 25.0 kg/m2
* Physically inactive
* Internet user with regular access to high-speed internet
* Willing and able to complete study requirements

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of invasive breast cancer
* Medical contraindication to exercise
* Medical problem or other issue that would interfere with intervention
* Current participation in another physical activity study
